xxl.core.xml.storage
Class Split

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.storage.Split
Direct Known Subclasses:
MatrixSplit, SimpleSplit
public abstract class Split
extends Object

The Split classes provide methods to split an XML subtree when it gets to big for the blocksize while inserting an new node.

Field Summary
protected  Container container
          The container used inside
protected  int maxSubtreeSize
          The maximal possible size of a subtree.
protected  NodeConverter nodeConverter
          Converter used for single nodes of arbitrary type.
protected  float ratio
          The ration between left and right partitions when chosing a split.
protected  SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter
          Converter for a subtree used to determine the sizes of the subtrees.
protected  int tolerance
          How many bytes are the partitions allowed to differ from the ratio
 
Constructor Summary
Split(Container container, SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter, int maxSubtreeSize)
          Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using a ratia of 1.0 between the left and right parition when spliting.

          Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using the given ratio between left and right parition when spliting.

          Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using a the given ratio between left and right parition when spliting and setting the split tolerance.
Split(Container container, SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter, int maxSubtreeSize, int tolerance)
          Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using 1.0 as ratio between left and right parition when spliting and setting the split tolerance.

Constructor Detail

Split

public Split(Container container,
             SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter,
             int maxSubtreeSize,
             float ratio,
             int tolerance)
Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using a the given ratio between left and right parition when spliting and setting the split tolerance.

Parameters:
ratio - The split ratio, left/right.
tolerance - The amount in bytes left and right partition can deviate from the desired ratio.
container - The Container to use when storing new subtrees.
maxSubtreeSize - The maximum size which the container allows.
subtreeConverter - Converts a subtree into a byte representation.

Split

public Split(Container container,
             SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter,
             int maxSubtreeSize,
             float ratio)
Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using the given ratio between left and right parition when spliting.

Parameters:
ratio - The split ratio, left/right.
container - The Container to use when storing new subtrees.
maxSubtreeSize - The maximum size which the container allows.
subtreeConverter - Converts a subtree into a byte representation.

Split

public Split(Container container,
             SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter,
             int maxSubtreeSize,
             int tolerance)
Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using 1.0 as ratio between left and right parition when spliting and setting the split tolerance.

Parameters:
tolerance - The amount in bytes left and right partition can deviate from the desired ratio.
container - The Container to use when storing new subtrees.
maxSubtreeSize - The maximum size which the container allows.
subtreeConverter - Converts a subtree into a byte representation.

Split

public Split(Container container,
             SubtreeConverter subtreeConverter,
             int maxSubtreeSize)
Creates a new instance of SimpleSplit, using a ratia of 1.0 between the left and right parition when spliting.

Parameters:
container - The Container to use when storing new subtrees.
maxSubtreeSize - The maximum size which the container allows.
subtreeConverter - Converts a subtree into a byte representation.
Method Detail

split

public Node split(Node root)
Splits an EXTree Subtree, defined by its root node. Inserts the newly created subtrees into the record manager and returns the root node of the separator which has to be inserted into the father subtree by the inserting function.

Parameters:
root - The root node of the subtree

split

public abstract Node split(Node root,
                           Object fatherTIdForNewRecords)
Splits an EXTree Subtree, defined by its root node. Inserts the newly created subtrees into the record manager and returns the root node of the separator which has to be inserted into the father subtree by the inserting function.

Parameters:
root - The root node of the subtree
fatherTIdForNewRecords - the parentTid for the new Records

storeSubTree

protected ProxyNode storeSubTree(Node root,
                                 Object parentId)
Stores the subtree in a new node and returns a proxy node to the new container entry.

Parameters:
root - The root of the subtree to be stored.
parentId - the parentId for the new container entry.
Returns:
ProxyNode pointing to the new entry.

storeSubTree

protected ProxyNode storeSubTree(List forest,
                                 Object parentId)
Stores the subtree containing all nodes of the given list in a new node and returns a proxy node to the new container entry.

Parameters:
forest - a list of nodes which should be stored in a new node inside the container.
parentId - the parentId for the new container entry.
Returns:
ProxyNode pointing to the new entry.
